universities.title: University of Melbourne
universities.description: The University of Melbourne is a public research university located in Melbourne, Australia. Founded in 1853, it is Australia's second oldest university and the oldest in Victoria.

universities.title: University of Toronto
universities.description: The University of Toronto is a public research university in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Founded in 1827, it is Canada's oldest and one of the largest universities.

universities.title: Technical University of Munich
universities.description: The Technical University of Munich is a public research university in Munich. It is known for innovation in engineering and natural sciences.

universities.title: University of Tokyo
universities.description: Japan's most prestigious university, known for producing Nobel laureates and leaders. Established in 1877, it consistently ranks as Asia's top university with world-class research facilities.

universities.title: University of Manchester
universities.description: The University of Manchester is a public research university in Manchester, England. It has the largest student community in the UK.

universities.title: National University of Singapore
universities.description: The National University of Singapore is Singapore's flagship university offering a global approach to education and research.

universities.title: Kyoto University
universities.description: Known for academic freedom and groundbreaking research. Home to multiple Nobel Prize winners, Kyoto University offers a unique educational experience in Japan's cultural capital.

universities.title: Osaka University
universities.description: Japan's 6th oldest university with strong programs in engineering, medicine, and humanities. Known for practical education and strong industry connections.

universities.title: Tohoku University
universities.description: One of the original Imperial Universities, known for being the first to admit female students. Strong in materials science, disaster prevention research, and engineering.

universities.title: Waseda University
universities.description: One of Japan's most prestigious private universities with a strong international reputation. Known for producing business leaders, politicians, and entrepreneurs. Offers extensive English programs.

universities.title: Keio University
universities.description: Japan's oldest private university, founded in 1858. Strong business and medical programs with excellent alumni network and industry connections.

universities.title: Nagoya University
universities.description: Research-intensive university with six Nobel Prize laureates. Strong in physics, chemistry, and engineering. Known for its collaborative research environment.

universities.title: Kyushu University
universities.description: A leading research university with a beautiful new campus. Known for engineering, design, and Asian studies. Lower cost of living compared to Tokyo.

universities.title: Hokkaido University
universities.description: Known for its beautiful campus, strong agricultural sciences, and environmental research. Great for nature lovers with lower living costs.

universities.title: Ritsumeikan Asia Pacific University
universities.description: Japan's most international university with 50% international students from 90+ countries. All programs available in English. Ideal for students without Japanese proficiency.
